name: Amazon Cries for Freedom
description:
An indigenous Amazon village is invaded by corrupt land grabbers, who aim to remove the natives from their land, for commercial interests. Surprised in the middle of the night, the Indians were captured, some killed by the corrupt. The militia leader has the young shaman Kaluanã arrested, our Adventure Hero. He must escape from captivity and lead his tribe in the fight against these corrupt people, a fight for freedom. A dive into the indigenous culture in Brazil, you will know more about its values and connection with mother earth and Amazons.

Survive, Protect and live the great adventure of tupi's lands.
Discover the mythology of the Amazon's Indians, and fight against the corrupts milicies.
